{"step_by_step_thinking": "Resistance training is a type of physical exercise that involves a series of activities designed to improve strength and endurance. It's often associated with weightlifting. When you do resistance training regularly, it can cause hypertrophy or an increase in the size of your skeletal muscle. The muscles experience growth from the increase in the size of its component cells. So, resistance training is usually associated with increasing muscle hypertrophy.", "answer_choice": "A"}
